entries.name: patterns/idioms
entries.content:
# Ruby Idioms

## Prefer `each` and iterators

Use collection iterators instead of indexed loops.

## Use symbols for identifiers

Symbols are efficient for keys and labels.

entries.name: formatters/overview
entries.content:
# Ruby Formatters

RuboCop can auto-correct formatting issues.

See: https://docs.rubocop.org/rubocop/

entries.name: spec
entries.content:
# Ruby Syntax Reference

Source: https://docs.ruby-lang.org/en/3.3.0/doc/syntax_rdoc.html

entries.name: linters/overview
entries.content:
# Ruby Linters

There is no official Ruby linter; RuboCop is widely used.

See: https://docs.rubocop.org/rubocop/
